params.context: How to evaluate this  what would prove it true/false?
params.proposition: The mental model / wisdom being tested
params.resolutionTime: When this can be resolved (unix timestamp)

shareInsight(uint256,string).details: Insights are events  free to post, permanently on-chain

markExpired(uint256).notice: Mark market as expired if resolver didn't act

resolve(uint256,uint8).notice: Resolve a market after resolution time

shareInsight(uint256,string).notice: Share an insight about a proposition (on-chain commentary)

stakeFor(uint256).notice: Stake FOR a proposition being true
